summary: A Chinese warlord and an engaged Christian missionary fall in love.
cast: Barbara Stanwyck|Nils Asther|Toshia Mori|Walter Connolly|Gavin Gordon|Lucien Littlefield|Richard Loo|Helen Jerome Eddy|Emmett Corrigan|Jessie Arnold|Clara Blandick|Robert Bolder|Nora Cecil|Wong Chung|Knute Erickson|Willie Fung|Adda Gleason|Ella Hall|Daisy Jefferson|Arthur Johnson|Tetsu Komai|Eddie Lee|Milton Lee|Lillian Leighton|Harriet Lorraine|Doris Louellyn|Martha Mattox|Arthur Millett|Moy Ming|Miller Newman|Robert Wayne|Ray Young
director: Director: Frank Capra (as Frank R. Capra)
title: La amargura del general Yen
